body_html:
By the way, to write the PR, I refer to SigmoidGrad which is introduced by commit 8624ecc

auto y = ConjugateHelper(grad_scope, op.output(0));
grad_outputs->push_back(internal::SigmoidGrad(scope, y, grad));

To be honest, I agree that grad_scope should be used below, rather than scope. But the author of the commit seems a robot, right?
